name: Rise of dragons
description:
It's a global co-op game! In the world of Lord of the Rings, choose the right profession for you and fight against Sauron's legions.Slay monsters to get equipment that will make you stronger and challenge bosses, form guilds with your friends to fight Sauron and his men, or fight with other players in Dragon City, in the Battle of the Territories, or on various battlefields. Each day, you can earn a large amount of gold and growth resources in the game.



◆Game Features◆
With three distinctive professions: warrior, mage and archer.
Over 100 types of equipment can be obtained by killing various bosses in the game.
Hundreds of bosses await your challenge!
There are over 10 daily features to play with and plenty of resources to get you started!
Form guilds with other players, you can fight for Dragon City, seize territory, and compete with your opponents on various battlefields!

◆Rich maps and bosses ◆
Dozens of maps and dozens of bosses of different strengths await the player's challenge, and legends are yours to create!

◆ Diverse equipment ◆
Hundreds of pieces of equipment drop randomly from different bosses, and with patience, all equipment can be obtained.
Choose different equipment for different environments, both skill and strategy.
High-grade equipment also has a set effect, so you can get a great power-up by getting a set together!

◆ Many ways to play ◆

There will be rewarding events starting at regular times every day.
